"Releasing Potentials":
"You can use the Item Lab's \"Release Potential\" function to unlock each weapon's unique Potential at the cost of some Gathering Materials and N-Meseta.
"
"Once the Potential has been released, you can raise its level by spending more N-Meseta and Gathering Materials."

"To release Potentials, you need material items such as Monotite, Dualomite, Trinite, Tetracite, Pentrite and N-Excubes.

For information on how to obtain N-Excubes, please consult the entry for N-Excubes."
